title: FS: N172 Old Judge MIKE "KING" KELLY PSA A
author: BosseFieldBoy

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Old Judge MIKE "KING" KELLY PSA A
posts.post_content:
I'm selling a 1887 N172 Mike Kelly, Catching Hands Head High, PSA Authentic.  Card appears to have been trimmed on the left edge.

I need to net $1700 via cash, check, money order or PayPal FF.  Charges will be higher if we do via PayPal invoice.

Shipping included in price.
Had a couple of people request some photos near the top of the card.  These are the best I can do with an iphone.  Thanks and PM me if you have any questions!
